text: Eva Ingeborg Scholz (16 February 1928 - 21 March 2022) was a German actress.BFI.org Her career began 1947. She was born in Berlin. Her best known roles were 1-2-3 Corona, The Lost One (1951), The Devil's General (1955), Emil and the Detectives (1964) and Rainer Werner Fassbinder's The American Soldier (1970). Scholz died on 21 March 2022 at the age of 94.Eva-Ingeborg Scholz ist gestorben. Stuttgarter Zeitung. Abgerufen am 21.
